body:
Did you try to reconnect the remote?

```
rclone config reconnect mail:
```

If that doesn't do it, please open a support request on the forums and use the help and support template.

https://forum.rclone.org/

Does it support reconnect?
```
$ rclone config reconnect mail:
Error: backend doesn't support reconnect or authorize
```
Also started a new [forum topic](https://forum.rclone.org/t/mail-ru-cloud-failed-to-authorize-oauth2-server-response-missing-access-token/33707).

The integration tests for mail ru started falling in the same way recently.

I think the api must have changed somehow.

Any ideas anyone? @ivandeex ?

rename.to: mailru backend giving oauth2: server response missing access_token

body:
figured out the fix
mailru for external applications requires a special password
<details><summary>Go to security</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/15097064/198360318-d1b450ed-e61c-47ac-a4ef-b24c4f5146f7.png)

</details>

<details><summary>Password for apps</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/15097064/198360522-e98efea4-6b2a-4bb9-82d1-3367d17e8028.png)

</details>

<details><summary>Add</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/15097064/198360621-2ecefc89-0ae5-4a35-ae6d-52f2b7b8d61a.png)
generated password works in rclone

</details>

issue.title: mail.ru.cloud oauth2 still fails

repository.name: rclone
repository.description: "rsync for cloud storage" - Google Drive, S3, Dropbox, Backblaze B2, One Drive, Swift, Hubic, Wasabi, Google Cloud Storage, Azure Blob, Azure Files, Yandex Files

issue.body:
<!--

We understand you are having a problem with rclone; we want to help you with that!

**STOP and READ**
**YOUR POST WILL BE REMOVED IF IT IS LOW QUALITY**:
Please show the effort you've put into solving the problem and please be specific.
People are volunteering their time to help! Low effort posts are not likely to get good answers!

If you think you might have found a bug, try to replicate it with the latest beta (or stable).
The update instructions are available at https://rclone.org/commands/rclone_selfupdate/

If you can still replicate it or just got a question then please use the rclone forum:

    https://forum.rclone.org/

for a quick response instead of filing an issue on this repo.

If nothing else helps, then please fill in the info below which helps us help you.

**DO NOT REDACT** any information except passwords/keys/personal info.

You should use 3 backticks to begin and end your paste to make it readable.

Make sure to include a log obtained with '-vv'.

You can also use '-vv --log-file bug.log' and a service such as https://pastebin.com or https://gist.github.com/

Thank you

The Rclone Developers

-->

#### What is the problem you are having with rclone?

This is a continuation of https://github.com/rclone/rclone/issues/3988 as that one is closed and locked.

I am having that exact problem, I do not use F2A, the credentials are definitely correct (the config worked before).

I was able to capture the HTTP dump, see below. Basically the server complains that credentials are invalid. 

What's more, I cannot login via old Mail.ru Cloud Windows software (with the same error text). It was syncing well, but after I logged out, I cannot log back in. Have not tried Disk-O as I don't have it.

I hope that, like the original, the error is sporadic and will resolve by itself. Otherwise, it seems the server has changed (or stopped supporting "cloud-win" client_id) method of auth.
 
#### What is your rclone version (output from `rclone version`)

v1.51.0

#### Which OS you are using and how many bits (e.g. Windows 7, 64 bit)

Win 10 x64

#### Which cloud storage system are you using? (e.g. Google Drive)

mailru

#### The command you were trying to run (e.g. `rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

rclone lsd mrc:

#### A log from the command with the `-vv` flag (e.g. output from `rclone -vv copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

```
C:\Users\positron\Downloads\Soft>rclone lsd mrc: --dump headers,bodies -vvv
2022/10/29 13:15:54 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.51.0" starting with parameters ["rclone" "lsd" "mrc:" "--dump" "headers,bodies" "-vvv"]
2022/10/29 13:15:54 DEBUG : Using config file from "C:\\Users\\positron\\Downloads\\Soft\\rclone.conf"
2022/10/29 13:15:54 DEBUG : You have specified to dump information. Please be noted that the Accept-Encoding as shown may not be correct in the request and the response may not show Content-Encoding if the go standard libraries auto gzip encoding was in effect. In this case the body of the request will be gunzipped before showing it.
2022/10/29 13:15:54 INFO  : []: Valid token not found, authorizing.
2022/10/29 13:15:54 DEBUG : >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
2022/10/29 13:15:54 DEBUG : HTTP REQUEST (req 0xc0000f4900)
2022/10/29 13:15:54 DEBUG : POST /token HTTP/1.1
Host: o2.mail.ru
User-Agent: rclone/v1.51.0
Content-Length: 91
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

client_id=cloud-win&grant_type=password&password=***&username=***%40mail.ru
2022/10/29 13:15:54 DEBUG : >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
2022/10/29 13:15:58 DEBUG : <<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<
2022/10/29 13:15:58 DEBUG : HTTP RESPONSE (req 0xc0000f4900)
2022/10/29 13:15:58 DEBUG : HTTP/2.0 200 OK
Content-Length: 111
Cache-Control: no-cache,no-store,must-revalidate
Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8
Date: Sat, 29 Oct 2022 07:15:57 GMT
Expires: Fri, 29 Oct 2021 07:15:56 GMT
Last-Modified: Sat, 29 Oct 2022 10:15:56 GMT
Pragma: no-cache
Server: nginx
Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains; preload
X-Frame-Options: DENY
X-Host: fau43.m.smailru.net
X-Mru-Request-Id: f1efa4cb

{"error":"invalid username or password","error_code":3,"error_description":"username or password is incorrect"}
2022/10/29 13:15:58 DEBUG : <<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<
2022/10/29 13:15:58 Failed to create file system for "mrc:": Failed to authorize: oauth2: server response missing access_token

```

<!--- Please keep the note below for others who read your bug report. -->

#### How to use GitHub

* Please use the üëç [reaction](https://blog.github.com/2016-03-10-add-reactions-to-pull-requests-issues-and-comments/) to show that you are affected by the same issue.
* Please don't comment if you have no relevant information to add. It's just extra noise for everyone subscribed to this issue.
* Subscribe to receive notifications on status change and new comments.

body: Hi @Alexandrsv, the workaround asks to add a phone to the account, did it do that for you?

Thank you @Alexandrsv that works well for me.

I've attempted to write some notes up to go in the docs - how does this look?

When I use mail.ru I get it mostly in Russian, but with some bits in English so this may not be exactly what you see.

## Configuration

Here is an example of making a mailru configuration. First create a Mail.ru Cloud
account and choose a tariff.

You will need to log in and create an app password for rclone.

- Click on your user icon in the top right
- Go to Security / "–ü–∞—Ä–æ–ª—å –∏ –±–µ–∑–æ–ø–∞—Å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å"
- Click password for apps / "–ü–∞—Ä–æ–ª–∏ –¥–ª—è –≤–Ω–µ—à–Ω–∏—Ö –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π"
- Add the password - give it a name - eg "rclone"
- Copy the password and use this password below - your normal login password won't work.

Now run

    rclone config

[snip]
I confirm that using the application password worked just fine. Thanks for pointing out the solution.
I've merged a doc fix for this which will be on the website and in rclone in v1.60.1

issue.title: docs: no need to disable 2FA for Mail.ru Cloud anymore

repository.name: rclone
repository.description: "rsync for cloud storage" - Google Drive, S3, Dropbox, Backblaze B2, One Drive, Swift, Hubic, Wasabi, Google Cloud Storage, Azure Blob, Azure Files, Yandex Files

issue.body:
<!--
Thank you very much for contributing code or documentation to rclone! Please
fill out the following questions to make it easier for us to review your
changes.

You do not need to check all the boxes below all at once, feel free to take
your time and add more commits. If you're done and ready for review, please
check the last box.
-->

#### What is the purpose of this change?

This sentence was written at the time when backend used access token, nowadays, users need to generate and use application password instead, see #6398. The application password can be used without 2FA being turned off.

#### Was the change discussed in an issue or in the forum before?

#6398

#### Checklist

- [x] I have read the [contribution guidelines](https://github.com/rclone/rclone/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#submitting-a-new-feature-or-bug-fix).
- [x] I have added tests for all changes in this PR if appropriate.
- [x] I have added documentation for the changes if appropriate.
- [x] All commit messages are in [house style](https://github.com/rclone/rclone/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#commit-messages).
- [x] I'm done, this Pull Request is ready for review :-)
